item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Only so much of life do I know as I have lived. " -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "If you can dream it, you can do it. Always remember that this whole thing was started with a dream and a mouse." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "In the long run, men hit only what they aim at. Therefore, they had better aim at something high." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "But until a person can say deeply and honestly, "I am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday," that person cannot say, "I choose otherwise." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t live long enough to make them all yourself. " -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart" -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Beautiful young people are accidents of nature, but beautiful old people are works of art. " -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "You can often change your circumstances by changing your attitude" -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift would be curiosity." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "What could we accomplish if we knew we could not fail?" -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "If someone betrays you once, it’s their fault; if they betray you twice, it’s your fault." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Courage is exhilarating." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Character building begins in our infancy and continues until death." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Make the most of yourself....for that is all there is of you." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The only way to have a friend is to be one." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
